# Visualization

## Volcano plot

```{r}
library(EnhancedVolcano)
```

```{r volcano, cache = TRUE, fig.width = 6, fig.height = 5.5, fig.align = "center"}
EnhancedVolcano(res_pbs_tb,
        lab = res_pbs_tb$SYMBOL, 
        x = 'log2FoldChange',
        y = 'padj', 
        title = 'KO vs Control, PBS',
        subtitle = NULL,
        pCutoff = 0.05, 
        FCcutoff = 0.58)

EnhancedVolcano(res_lps_tb,
        lab = res_lps_tb$SYMBOL, 
        x = 'log2FoldChange',
        y = 'padj', 
        title = 'KO vs Control, LPS',
        subtitle = NULL,
        pCutoff = 0.05, 
        FCcutoff = 0.58)
```
